short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extenstion runs python code from current page, e.g chatGPT window it requires a backend app to run it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extenstion runs python code from current page, e.g chatGPT window it requires a backend app to run it. The backend in any simple application that has a endpoint http://localhost:9999/run to run a python code
